fields.headline: Southern stars
fields.bodyText: Land of the Giants Jamie Wilson kicks off our Australia special up a tree, surveying the spectacular beauty of the remote and largely ignored south-west coast. Rise and shine Paul Miles watches the sun come up over the Red Centre from a new resort with unrivalled views. Are you Experienced? Sean Clarke joins a road trip with a difference along the south coast. Stretch your legs If the idea of the long flight Down Under fills you with dread, Will Hide suggests seven cities where you can break your journey along the way.
